root.name: True Golf Classics: Waialae Country Club
root.description: OverviewTrue Golf Classics: Waialae Country Club ("New 3D Golf Simulation: Waialae no Kiseki" in Japan) is a golf simulator and an indirect follow-up to TE Soft's earlier Harunaruka Augusta golf sim for the Super Famicom. As with that game, Waialae Country Club takes place in a prestigious US golf course (the eponymous Waialae) and features all 18 holes to play through.As with TE Soft's other golf sims, more care is taken towards realism and simulation elements, meaning it is drier and more difficult than many other console golf games. It takes full advantage of the SNES's mode 7 capabilities to depict a 3D course.
